name: Alieunt Metroidvania
description:
A procedural metroidvania game!

goal :

defeat all enemies

how to play

match your character color to with enemies to deal damage!

match your character color to doors to unlock them! 

Player 1 Controls

arrow keys - move

jump - space

hold up and jump to super jump

a - fire

zxcv - switch colors

shift - minimap

Player 2 Controls

gamepad

left stick - move

face down - jump

face left- fire

select - options
